description.brief: Freezing damage that slows enemies and can shatter them when they reach critical cold thresholds.
description.detailed: Cold damage represents the power of preservation and crystallization. It excels at controlling enemy movement through slowing effects and can build up to devastating shattering attacks when enemies become fully frozen. Cold damage creates defensive benefits through armor formation and movement control.
description.visual_effects: Blue and white ice crystals with crackling freeze sounds, frost particles, and crystallization effects
description.lore_explanation: Cold damage channels the ancient power of Glacius, the Eternal Frost - the fundamental force of preservation that existed before creation itself. This primal cold flows through Yggdrasil's crystalline bark, maintaining the stability of all existence.

status_effects.description: Reduces movement speed by 10% per stack, up to 50%
Completely immobilizes target, making them vulnerable to shattering
Next hit deals 150% damage and removes this effect

special_mechanics.name: Freeze Buildup
special_mechanics.description: Cold damage accumulates on enemies; at 100% buildup, they become Frozen

special_mechanics.name: Shatter
special_mechanics.description: Killing a frozen enemy causes an area explosion dealing cold damage

special_mechanics.name: Ice Armor
special_mechanics.description: Cold damage can create protective ice barriers around the caster

vs_fire.effect: Fire damage removes cold effects; cold damage reduces fire damage by 25%

vs_lightning.effect: Lightning damage deals +50% damage to frozen targets

vs_physical.effect: Physical damage gains +30% damage against chilled targets

with_stats.cold_mastery: Direct multiplier to all cold effects

lore_details.fundamental_connection: Draws directly from Glacius, the Eternal Frost, one of the three Fundamental Gods
lore_details.yggdrasil_manifestation: Manifests through the crystalline bark that preserves Yggdrasil's memories
lore_details.cosmic_role: Represents the force that maintains stability and prevents cosmic decay
lore_details.ancient_nature: Predates the World Tree itself, making it one of the most primal forms of magic

interaction_explanation.strong_against: Chaos and Lightning - Cold's preservation freezes chaotic change and grounds electrical energy into stable crystalline forms
interaction_explanation.weak_against: Fire and Radiance - Heat melts ice, divine light reveals what cold darkness would conceal
interaction_explanation.neutral_with: Cold (self-mastery) and Physical - Preservation neither aids nor hinders direct physical force
